barista_record.MSG_TEXT: ABC Analysis percentages must equal 100 percent.[$0a$]

This task will build the Physical Inventory Cycle Code table (IVC_PHYSCODE) from the [$0a$]existing cycle code in the Item Warehouse table (IVM_ITEMWHSE). It is intended to [$0a$]be run once after a DataPort from Addon version 6 or 7. It will not overwrite existing [$0a$]cycle codes.[$0a$][$0a$]Do you wish to continue?[$0a$]

This task will build the Display Description so that description segments are smoothed[$0a$]out, like the function fnitem$() does. The Display Description field will be used in[$0a$]Barista instead of the regular description since Barista has no concept of fnitem$().[$0a$][$0a$]This program is intended to be run once after a DataPort from Addon version 6 or 7. [$0a$]It will not overwrite existing Display Descriptions.[$0a$][$0a$]Do you wish to continue?[$0a$]

Margin over Cost must be less than 100%.[$0a$]

Enter the actual physical count(s), separated by commas[$0a$]if more than one. The system will sum them for you. (You[$0a$]may use any separator you wish, such as spaces or slashes.)[$0a$]

This program will create warehouse records for those items that have not already been[$0a$]set up in the new warehouse. The new records will zero out the Physical Count, [$0a$]Landed Cost, Last Purchase Cost, On Hand, On Order and Committed Quantity[$0a$]numeric fields. All other numeric fields from the old warehouse will be copied. Of the[$0a$]remaining character fields, the Cycle Code, Distribution Code, Buyer Code,[$0a$]Restocking Vendor, Price Codes, ABC, EOQ, Order Point and Safety Stock[$0a$]codes will be copied from the old warehouse. All other character fields will be[$0a$]re-initialized. Do you wish to continue?[$0a$]
The Cost Change by Percentage updated successfully. %1 record(s) written.[$0a$]Run the Valuation Report to inspect the changes or re-run Cost Change by Percentage to add more items.[$0a$]
Cost Changes With Future Effective Dates May Not Be Implemented Until That Date.[$0a$]
You cannot change the Lot/Serial or Inventoried flags if there is any[$0a$]quantity on hand in any warehouse. Adjust out all quantities first.[$0a$]
The "From" and "To" warehouses cannot be the same[$0a$]
This Item Number already exists.[$0a$]
This item is not in the selected cycle. Enter another item, change [$0a$]the cycle code, or add this item's cycle in Select Cycles for Freeze.[$0a$]

%1IFO Tiers which do NOT agree with the reported inventory on hand quantity[$0a$]will be adjusted. A new tier will be added using the inventory item cost[$0a$]and the difference between the sum of the current tiers and the current[$0a$]quantity on hand. Do you wish to continue?[$0a$]
All %1IFO Tiers will be cleared. A new tier will[$0a$]be created based on the inventory on hand quantity[$0a$]and inventory item cost. Do you wish to continue?[$0a$]
